posts.html:
@Taudisban
Yup, you are completely correct. This does not overwrite pumps, you a Kiln Fiend will become 7/4 after you cast this.

On an unrelated note, DGM is the first set in a while not to have any actual Dragons in it. I guess this will have to do.

posts.post_content:
I would like this better if it was each creature, not just ones you control, or target creature you do or do not control.  
That way, it would kill tribal decks that pump their creatures based on subtype, and against gruul beaters that go in for 57 damage a turn with 3 creatures, it would give you longer to live.
